column2: What do you think of using these semi-conductors on job #2489? They are a reasonable price and of a lot higher quality.
I have been working on a new design in solidworks that is less complicated. I believe the vacuum box can be simplified, and I propose using this new grade of aluminum.

column1: New product idea in Ancillary Microwave Products hardware division
column2: I have recently come across a great article in xyz magazine, and I believe we should look into this technology to help build out our new couplers product line.
I have mocked up this new product design for our Switches division. I think this will allow us to be competitive with XYZ company, while also diversifying the line.
